result.markdown:
::: {.question} **Valuation and Ownership After Equity Issuance** ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(101) #| eval: true #| echo: false #| results: asis #| warning: false # Valores aleatórios founder_shares <- 4 partner_investment <- round(runif(1, 1.5, 2.5), 3) partner_shares <- 1.5 share_price <- round(partner_investment / partner_shares, 3) total_shares <- founder_shares + partner_shares post_money <- round(total_shares * share_price, 3) partner_pct <- round((partner_shares / total_shares) * 100, 3) ``` ::: Erica owns all **4 million shares** of her company, CoralTech. A new partner is offering to invest **1.872 million** in exchange for **1.5 million shares**. ::: {.question-block}
1. What is the post-money valuation (in million)?
✅ Post-money = (5.5) shares × $1.248 (1.872/ 1.5) = **6.864 million**
::: ::: {.question-block}
2. What percentage of the company will the new partner own?
✅ Partner Ownership = 1.5 / 5.5 × 100 = **27.273%**
::: :::
